titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States relating to equality of rights and reproductive rights.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 2/14/2011--Introduced. Constitutional Amendment - Prohibits the United States or any state from denying or abridging: (1) equality of rights under the law on account of sex, or (2) reproductive rights for women.
